description technical detail:
Sharp 20-inch-class touchscreen LCD Monitor
This 20-inch-class touchscreen LCD panel delivers Full HD resolution with performance-enhancing UV2A technology. Its touch screen provides extremely quick response for writing and touch gestures. When connected to a device running Windows 8, the monitor serves as a beautifully intuitive interface.
